duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide patient-centered care in home health and primary care settings, with a focus on geriatrics and hospice care.
Address patient needs with compassion and dedication, ensuring the highest quality of care.
Maintain active licensing and certifications required for the role, including DEA license and CPR/BLS certification.

education_certification.credential: Licensed Nurse Practitioner (NP) in the State of practice, with geriatric training/experience preferred.
